This hard-to-find restaurant completely fulfilled our high expectations. We chose 7 courses tasting menu but finally got 9 (two additions were complementary). All dishes were just about art of food. The service was very professional and friendly. We had a great food adventure.  Just book this  place in advance and don't be surprised they ask for credit card to confirm your booking. This place is packed every evening. Only tasting menu is served for groups.
